name: Auros
overview:
We are a digital consultancy and technology company.

Our objective is to create inspiring internet strategies and build technology solutions across content, commerce, analytics, social and search.

Our goal is to help clients achieve measurable business benefits and results.

We have worked with over 130 clients spanning 21 countries and 20 languages. These organisations, across the commercial, public and not for profit sectors, rely on Auros for advice and implementation expertise in relation to digital technologies, on a global scale. Over 1 billion web users interact with the digital solutions we have helped to build.

Our strategies focus on the real business benefits our clients want, and how we can help them achieve these goals. We believe in using technology as a springboard to achieve great things, be that measured in terms of more effective lead generation, higher revenues or simply more engaged stakeholders.

Our technology solutions incorporate both bespoke developments and leading edge technologies from third party vendors. Innovation is a big part of what we do - through both our own research and development and entrepreneurial partnerships. We are committed to investment in learning and in helping our clients to translate this investment into engaging their audiences and achieving their goals.

Our clients include Avery Weigh-Tronix, BCA, Knauf, Virgin Media Business and a wide range of local and central government organisations.
